item.title: SingPost releases stamps showcasing classic board games
item.description: Source: SingPost. The new traditional board games stamp issue. Singapore Post (SingPost) is releasing a new set of five square stamps on April 27th. Each stamp features a hand-drawn image of a traditional board game popular in Singapore during the 1970s and 80s: Chinese chess, the diamond game, aeroplane chess, snakes and ladders, and checkers. Chinese chess (1st local denomination) is a strategic board game for two players simulating a battle between two armies.
